pullRequest.title: Added tests
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of changes
What did you change in this pull request?  Provide a description of files changed, user interactions changed, etc.  Include how to test your changes.
Added tests.
Related issue
Link to the GitHub issue this pull request addresses using the #issuenum format.  If it completes an issue, use Fixes #issuenum to automatically close the issue.
Checklist
Things for the developer to confirm they've done before the PR should be accepted:
* [ ] CHANGELOG.md (and UPGRADING.md if necessary) updated with information for new change.

 Tests added (or description of how to test) for any new features.
* [ ] User documentation updated for UI or technical changes.

commit.message: Added tests
Updated tests
Updated tests
Merged base branch and fixed merge conflict
Updated tests, added logic to jsx files, added classnames used by tests
Updated tests
Merge branch 'analysis/_base_results' into analysis/_tests
Merge branch 'analysis/_base_results' into analysis/_tests
Merged branch and fixed merge conflicts. Added missing methods
Added missing import statements
Reverted antd v4 update
Added test for provenance.
Updated tests
Added test helper to get number of parameters for a tool. Removed ignore statement for analysisdetailspageit. Added temp comments to controller

Added tests and helpers required by these tests. Added comments. Added another analysis submission to test db xml file. Add code to copy a file to the output directory within the tmp directory used by the tests as it doesn't work with a relative path
Added tests and updated previous tests with more code. Refactored tests and helpers. Added file for bio hansel results and updated xml db file with new analyses.
Merge branch 'analysis/_base_results' into analysis/_tests
Added provenance test for controller. Removed extra white space. Removed console.log statement
Merge branch 'analysis/_tests' of github.com:deepsidhu85/irida into analysis/_tests
Merged analysis/_base into branch and fixed merge conflicts
Updated testUnknownPipelineOutput to test for unknown pipeline view. Updated db xml file with analysis details for the unknown analysis type.
Generalized function to check if expected analysis details are equivalent to the actual details displayed. Formatted code.
Added missing @param statement for method
Merged dev and fixed merge conflicts
Set table search to an empty string
Reverted setting table search to an empty string as it is being fixed in another branch
Merge branch 'analysis/_base_results' into analysis/_tests
Fixed tests

nodes.bodyText: All the setting below seems really... obtuse. Would it not be easier to pass in the AnalysisOutputFile into the AnalysisOutputFileInfo constructor and have the constructor determine what it wants to do with it?

So I know I created this ResponseDetails class, but I think moving forward we should look at ResponseEntitys which is built into the Spring Framework.  See: Using Spring ResponseEntity to Manipulate the HTTP Response
analysisOutputsContext.outputs !== null can always be shortened to !analysisOutputsContext.outputs bcause !null === true
Let stop using these classes instead just add the inline styled e.g. marginTop: SPACED_LG
Don't like seeing {" "} it is generated by the editor.  If you really want spacing add it with an inline style like marginRight: SPACED_XS
Keeping on with random comments, we need to pay better attention to internationalization of numbers.  See MDN Intl.NumberFormat
Why do you need to call toString() on this?

commit.message: Updated tests to verify that the service layer calls are executed the expected number of times. Minor refactoring (removing classes, adding styles, removing unneessary space added to right of button)
Updated webpack public path to use setbaseurl function
